string.text:
A cutting-edge thermal optic with a 30Hz refresh rate for detecting heat signatures in darkness or obscured environments. Ideal for tactical, hunting, and surveillance applications, it enables target acquisition regardless of lighting conditions.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Torrey Pines Logic
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]1.0x
